context: Evaluates correct usage of the agent-skills Jira skill's JQL search functionality. The solution must call search_issues or the equivalent CLI search subcommand with appropriate arguments and correctly display the paginated results.

checklist.name: search_issues called
checklist.description: The solution calls search_issues with the jql parameter or invokes jira.py with the 'search' subcommand, passing the user-supplied JQL string

checklist.name: Results formatted correctly
checklist.description: Each returned issue is displayed with at least its key, summary, and status, using format_issues_list or equivalent output logic

checklist.name: max_results respected
checklist.description: When a result limit is supplied, it is passed as the max_results argument to search_issues, and no more than that number of issues are displayed

checklist.name: Default scope fallback
checklist.description: When no JQL is provided, merge_jql_with_scope or get_jira_defaults is used to retrieve the configured default scope and apply it to the search
